root.name: flash()
root.description: Flashes the backlight of the display for the specified duration. Returns true if backlight control is available. Backlight control is not available on all mobile phones.

parameter.label: hs
parameter.description: Handset: any variable of type Handset

parameter.label: duration
parameter.description: int: duration of flashing, in milliseconds, or 0 to turn off the flashing
